programme.desc: Zane, an astronomer, discovers intelligent alien life. But the aliens are keeping a deadly secret.

programme.title: Cutthroat Island
programme.desc: A female pirate and her companion race against their rivals to find a hidden island with a fabulous treasure.

programme.title: Gods of Egypt
programme.desc: A mortal teams with the god Horus in an alliance against Set, the god of darkness, who usurped Egypt's throne.

programme.title: A Christmas Hero
programme.desc: Firefighter Jenny has fallen in love with Tom. However his ex-wife Mary (a bestselling author) demands a reconciliation if he wants to see his daughter at Christmas.

programme.title: Leaves of Grass
programme.desc: An Ivy League professor is lured back to his hometown where his twin brother plots to take down a drug lord.

programme.title: A Little Bit of Heaven
programme.desc: A young woman (Kate Hudson) who uses her humor to avoid intimacy has a life-changing visit from her doctor in this divinely funny dramatic comedy. With Whoopi Goldberg and Peter Dinklage.

programme.title: Just in Time for Christmas
programme.desc: Grandpa Jim's guest appearance in a Christmas program turns into a hilarious disaster in this comedy. Despite the mishaps, the family learns to appreciate the true meaning of Christmas and the gift of Jesus.

programme.title: Christmas Cupid's Arrow
programme.desc: Holly, a single college professor, signs up for an online dating service but begins to grow suspicious when the guy's beautifully written texts don't match his actions.

programme.title: Maternal Instinct
programme.desc: A teenage girl who sees her mother shot goes into hiding with a police detective who grows attached to her as she protects her from the killer who is hunting the girl.

programme.title: Ivy & Mistletoe
programme.desc: A young woman is determined to get home for Christmas, but gets stranded in a small town during a snow storm. Little does she know that she is exactly where she is supposed to be.

programme.title: Christmas Miracle
programme.desc: The beloved "Painter of Light," Thomas Kinkade, presents this heartwarming family drama. Due to an unforeseen road closure, eight strangers are forced to take refuge in an abandoned church during a snow storm.

programme.title: Christmas Wedding Runaway
programme.desc: Maggie Mason left her fiancé at the altar of her early December wedding and run away to her Grandma's cabin in snowy, rural Massachusetts. When Maggie arrives at the cabin, Grandma's busy getting ready for the holiday.

programme.title: Snowman's Pass
programme.desc: Still struggling to accept her fiancé's death in a rock climbing accident, mountain guide DIANA PENNINGTON gratefully accepts industrialist CURT SEAVER's offer to find the body using a new satellite imagery technology his company has developed. But while traversing the legendary "Snowman's Pass" with Curt and his companions HUGO and TYLER, Diana is horrified to discover the search for her fiancé is a decoy they are in fact hunting for a fallen spy satellite, property of an enemy foreign power.

programme.title: Earth to Echo
programme.desc: After receiving a bizarre series of encrypted messages, a group of kids embark on an adventure with an alien who needs their help.

programme.title: Star Trek Beyond
programme.desc: On a rescue mission, the USS Enterprise is attacked by Krall, a warlord sworn against the Federation. Crashed on an uncharted world, the crew must join forces with Jaylah, a rebellious alien warrior, to escape and stop Krall from triggering all-out war.

programme.title: The Man in the Iron Mask
programme.desc: Leonardo DiCaprio leads a phenomenal cast in this thrilling tale of majesty and Musketeers. When the excesses of France's arrogant King Louis XIV begin to threaten his subjects' very lives, the legendary Musketeers reunite to save their country!

programme.title: The Adventures of Tintin
programme.desc: Tintin and his friends discover directions to a sunken ship commanded by Capt. Haddock's ancestor and go off on a treasure hunt.

programme.title: The African Queen
programme.desc: A timeless tale of two mismatched strangers joining forces in a common cause - and finding love along the way. The story chronicles the burgeoning romance as they reluctantly join forces to torpedo a German gunboat in war-torn East Africa.

programme.title: Greatest Show On Earth
programme.desc: Charlton Heston stars as Brad Braden, the circus manager who lives and breathes to keep the show rolling. With the Big Top about to hit rock bottom, Braden hires The Great Sebastian, a daring trapeze legend, to revitalize the circus.

programme.title: Ace in the Hole
programme.desc: A cave collapse traps a man, and all eyes turn toward the tragedy including those of Charles "Chuck" Tatum (Kirk Douglas), a washed-up newspaper reporter who sees the incident as a ticket back to his former days at the top of the journalism heap.

programme.title: I Walk Alone
programme.desc: After taking the rap for his partner, a mobster is released from prison to find his former partner entranched in a swank night club with no intention of sharing the riches.

programme.title: Danger Zone
programme.desc: An American mining engineer (Billy Zane, "Titanic") gets involved in a civil war and international conspiracy in Africa. Featuring Robert Downey Jr.

programme.title: Airplane vs. Volcano
programme.desc: When an airplane is trapped in a ring of erupting volcanoes, the passengers must survive without landing.

programme.title: The Code
programme.desc: A veteran thief recruits a younger crook to help him pull off one final job in order to repay his debt to the Russian mob.

programme.title: American Yakuza
programme.desc: Viggo Mortensen ("Green Book") stars as an undercover FBI agent who has risen through the ranks of the Yakuza and now finds himself caught in a war between the Yakuza, the mob and the FBI.

programme.title: Retrograde
programme.desc: Two opposing time travelers are sent back to the present to prevent a global biological disaster from occurring.

programme.title: Justin Bieber: The New Me
programme.desc: From teenage heartthrob to married man, Justin Bieber's career has had its ups and downs, but the young superstar has continued to evolve his identity.

programme.title: Hollywood Signs
programme.desc: Hollywood Signs is the documentary that celebrates autograph collecting, collectors, and our obsession with celebrities. It focuses on autograph dealing, the history of the autograph, autograph conventions, celebrities' point of view, and, of course, the folks whose lives revolve around autographs. Hollywood Signs is a love letter to a world with characters you definitely don't see every day.

programme.title: Ecstasy Of Order: The Tetris Master
programme.desc: Follows a group of record-holding Tetris players as they prepare to compete in the 2010 Classic Tetris World Championship.

programme.title: Red Heaven
programme.desc: In preparation for the first human mission to Mars, six volunteers take part in the ultimate dress rehearsal, living inside a year-long NASA simulation

programme.title: Burn
programme.desc: From executive producer Denis Leary, BURN is an action-packed documentary about Detroit told through the eyes of firefighters charged with the task of saving a city that many have written off.

programme.title: Covered Silence
programme.desc: Looking for help from a lifetime of trauma, Lala checks in at a mental hospital. There, she meets Niani, and the two form an unbreakable bond of friendship. Once released, Niani learns she is pregnant, and is fearful that her mental illness, and medications will affect the baby. Lala takes it upon herself to protect Niani at all costs. All that changes when Lala's own mental health is jeopardized, when her estranged mother returns in her life.

programme.title: Cries of Desire
programme.desc: Jermaine an aspiring male model controls his wife Ariel until a terrible accident invites a dangerous affair.

programme.title: Coming Home for Christmas
programme.desc: Coming home for the holidays is something most families cherish. After this holiday, Christmas will never be the same in the Higher-Mills family. Coming from mixed backgrounds, adopted siblings Smythe, Hanna, Bea, Shane, and Lonny along with their parents, Pat and Samantha, try to navigate their changing family and reunite during the holiday season.

programme.title: Soulful and Funny
programme.desc: Lancaster: Host Crystal Powell travels Dallas and tours historic Lancaster, Texas. Crystal takes you on a soulful and wholesome journey to family-owned and operated Casserole Soul Café. Followed by a snip from Crystal's stand-up special at SXSW!

programme.title: Soulful and Funny
programme.desc: Get hyped and head over with us to The Coaches Box in Duncanville, Texas, a Dallas suburb known for it's local sports legacy. Owner and operator Reginald Heath takes you on a journey to goal-winning and high-scoring delicious home-cooked fresh food alongside comedian D. Elli$.

programme.title: Soulful and Funny
programme.desc: Crystal is joined by local comedian Bryson Brown in Austin, Texas where they head down to the historic and celebrated Victory Grill. A local staple that hosted the likes of Billie Holiday and James Brown. Crystal partakes in local history and delicious shrimp and grits for this modern spin on brunch. Then, Crystal and Bryson bring the laughs with a special performance in Austin.

programme.title: Soulful and Funny
programme.desc: Feelin Okay? You will when Crystal take you through her sit down at Mr. A Ok's in San Antonio, Texas. We sit down with owner Cindy Kirk, whose father Mr. Alvis Kirk (Mr. A-OK) was the inspiration behind the restaurant. Cindy and her husband, chef Steven Harris, bring soul food and southern comfort including Fried Ribs, Chicken Fried Steak, and Oxtail to the San Antonio community. Then we're joined by local comedian Leah Sampson for laughs and a sit-down lunch!

programme.title: Soulful and Funny
programme.desc: Get ready for some island vibes, as Crystal takes you down to Houston where we're introduced to Just Oxtails in Missouri City, Texas. Locally owned and operated, Just Oxtails has been a local staple for the last twenty years where they've built a brand on “Just Oxtails!” Then we're joined by comedienne Lotto Marie who brings the laughs about her mid-west upbringing.

programme.title: Santa Girl
programme.desc: Santa Claus' only daughter wants to experience the "real world" before she must marry the son of Jack Frost, a boy she has never met, and take over the family business. Along with her trusty elf, Cassie Claus sets off to college while trying to keep her magic powers and famous father a secret. At school Cassie is pursued by two boys: Sam, sweetly awkward and J.R., handsome and wealthy. As her impending arranged marriage looms, Cassie struggles with her feelings for Sam and her obligation to her father and Christmas.

programme.title: Falling for Christmas
programme.desc: When champion figure skater Claire becomes injured she is sent to a rehabilitation center in the snowy mountains where she meets and falls for a local ice fisherman who shows her there is more to life than competition.

programme.title: The Merry In-laws
programme.desc: After Alex gets engaged to Peter, she goes to meet his parents for the first time, not knowing they are actually Santa and Mrs. Claus.

programme.title: Christmas in The Heartland
programme.desc: Kara and Jessie strike up an unlikely friendship when seated next to each other on a plane headed to the heartland. With both girls visiting family they've never met, they devise a plan to switch places for Christmas.

programme.title: You Were Never Lovelier
programme.desc: Love story and musical set in Latin America.

programme.title: Duffy
programme.desc: Duffy is a cunning aristocrat of criminals who is hired by Stefane, a young playboy, to hijack a boat carrying several million dollars of his father's fortune. The plot succeeds, with a little help from Segolene, Stefane's girlfriend - but also with an unexpected, sudden turn of events.

programme.title: Who's Minding The Mint?
programme.desc: A clerk who works in the mint in Washington, DC accidentally destroys $50,000 in cash, and attempts to sneak into the building in the middle of the night and run off enough cash on the presses to cover his mistake.

programme.title: Sahara
programme.desc: A U.S. Army tank crew joins a band of stragglers in a desperate search for water in the war-torn North African desert.

programme.title: Modern Romance
programme.desc: A story of modern careers, modern sporting goods, modern filmmaking... and an ancient war--the battle of the sexes. Edited for TV

programme.title: The Man Who Loved Women
programme.desc: A charming and romantic comedy about a man who never met a woman he couldn't love. Edited for TV

programme.title: The Competition
programme.desc: In a world where winning means survival, they broke the only rule... they fell in love.

programme.title: Eat A Bowl Of Tea
programme.desc: A Chinese-American and his wife face a clash of cultures in post-WWII New York's Chinatown.

programme.title: The Rough, Tough West
programme.desc: Steve Reynolds aka The Durango Kid, helps out a group of miners who are being forced to pay the greedy Mahoney to travel across his land, which he has acquired illegally. Reynolds enlists the aid of his alter ego, "The Durango Kid," and ends Mahoney's evil reign.

programme.title: Apache Territory
programme.desc: A drifter takes on marauding Apaches in order to save a group of besieged settlers.

programme.title: Relentless
programme.desc: Framed for a murder he didn't commit, a cowboy evades the law as he hunts for the real killer.

programme.title: The Violent Men
programme.desc: An ex-soldier's plans to move east are delayed after his brother is murdered on the orders of a land baron.

programme.title: Beyond the Sacramento
programme.desc: Gunfire and lawlessness rule the land in California until "Wild Bill Hickok" (Bill Elliott) comes along to clean it up. Fast action and plenty of fighting in this western which has Elliott saving a frontier town from Bradley Page and Frank LaRue.

programme.title: Breakheart Pass
programme.desc: As a train races through the Rocky Mountains, the passengers are being murdered! The only hope is John Deakin (Charles Bronson) who uncovers a secret that explodes in a torrent of shocking revelations, explosive brawls, and blazing gun battles.

programme.title: The Gatling Gun
programme.desc: Two backstabbing deserters steal a Gatling Gun from their cavalry unit to attack an Apache tribe and steal their gold. They get help from a naive pacifist pastor. Meanwhile, both the cavalry and the Apache go after them - and the Gun.

programme.title: The Alamo
programme.desc: John Wayne produces, directs, and stars in this retelling of the Alamo, a battle in which 185 men joined together against an army of 7,000. Filmed entirely in Texas, "The Alamo" is a visually stunning and historically accurate celebration of courage.

programme.title: Duel at Diablo
programme.desc: Frontier scout Jess Remsberg leads a wagon train through hostile territory to Fort Conchos. But underneath his valor, he has an ulterior motive: to settle a score with the man he believes killed his wife. James Garner and Sidney Poitier star.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: A con man makes his living by provoking and then betting on gunfights.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas encourages a drunken artist charged with murder to use his talents to identify the true killer.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas and Mark try to persuade a persecuted young mute to return stolen money.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: A lively old lady arrives in town hot on the trail of a notorious bandit and the reward money for capturing him.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: A doctor seeks revenge on the man he blames for ruining his practice.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas unmasks a killer posing as a door-to-door seed salesman.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas and Marshall Torrance run into trouble while transporting a captured killer back to face trial.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: A deathbed request from an old friend sends Lucas to a neighboring town in search of the man's long-lost sweetheart.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas thinks he has seen a ghost when a man, eerily similar to a man he killed, challenges him to a gunfight.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas agrees to take a job as an undercover agent and goes to investigate rumors of the sales of arms to renegade Indians. His life is endangered by the town drunk who stumbles onto his true identity.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: While Lucas is in Wyoming on the trail of a gang illegally selling weapons to the Indians, Mark stays with Miss Milly, where he suffers from loneliness and doubt with his father gone for 2 months.

programme.title: The Rifleman

programme.title: Jack Johnson

programme.title: Katy Perry
programme.desc: The Prismatic World Tour is a sensory explosion of eye-popping theatrics, daring acrobatics and of course, all the hits. This concert film is a visually stunning production that captures Katy's fun-loving personality and artistic vision. Spanning the entire length of the arena floor, the innovative Prismatic tour stage allows Katy to share intimate moments with her fans in a unique shared connection with the music. Directed for the stage in seven thematic acts, this unmissable spectacle features hit after hit after hit. The World Tour captures the excitement, color and energy of the live Katy Perry extravaganza.

programme.title: Entre El Amor y El Odio Capítulo 72
programme.desc: Ana Cristina sufre al saber que don Manuel está muerto. Familiares y amigos se despiden de don Manuel en su funeral. Ana Cristina se impresiona la saber que don Manuel fue sacerdote.

programme.title: Fuego en la Sangre Capítulo 69
programme.desc: Gabriela enfurece al saber que Sarita escapó de la casa. Sarita decide volverse monja. Fernando comienza su plan de seducir a Raquel.

programme.title: Fuego en la Sangre Capítulo 70
programme.desc: Jimena le confiesa Sofía que se casó con Óscar. Benito y Raquel encuentran a Gabriela y Fernando besándose.

programme.title: Fuego en la Sangre Capítulo 71

programme.title: Fuego en la Sangre Capítulo 72

programme.desc: Bella toma la decisión de ir a trabajar al club de Valle Encantado para solucionar los negocios de Gustavo. Bella se presenta ante Bernardo para conocer los detalles del club.

programme.title: María la del Barrio Capítulo 39
programme.desc: Tita comienza a sospechar que María tiene un amante por lo que investiga y la sigue. María le confiesa a Agripina que ella es la madre de Nandito.

programme.title: María la del Barrio Capítulo 40
programme.desc: Tita sufre porque cree que María tiene un amante, por lo que cita a Nandito para descubrir la verdad. Soraya conoce a Alicia y a su padre y a quien planea conquistar.

programme.title: María Mercedes Capítulo 17
programme.desc: Todos en la vecindad acusan a María Mercedes de ser mala mujer y su familia sufrirá las consecuencias. Jorge Luis está decidido a irse de la casa.

programme.title: María Mercedes Capítulo 18
programme.desc: Llega el día de la lectura del testamento de Santiago, en el que se establece que toda su fortuna será para Maria Mercedes y Malvina enloquece de coraje.

programme.title: Marimar Capítulo 29
programme.desc: Bella está decidida a jamás perdonar a Sergio y cobrar venganza. La tía Esperanza le confiesa a Bella que el señor Gustavo es su padre.

programme.title: Triunfo del Amor Capítulo 63
programme.desc: Bernarda confirma que María es la hija de Juan Pablo. Victoria le dice a Osvaldo que está dispuesta a luchar por su matrimonio. Guillermo estrangula a Ofelia cuando ésta intenta chantajearlo. María le dice a Max que tiene una sorpresa para él.

programme.title: Triunfo del Amor Capítulo 64
programme.desc: Victoria le promete a Osvaldo contarle sus secretos cuando él le confiese los suyos. Victoria le cuenta a Max la historia de su hija. Bernarda amenaza al padre Jerónimo por sugerirle que busque ayuda médica. Max le promete a Victoria encontrar a su hija.

programme.title: Cuidado con el Ángel Capítulo 38
programme.desc: Marichuy y Juan Miguel tienen un inesperado encuentro en el hospital cuando ambos van a visitar a Rocio antes de que sea operada. Marichuy siente mareos fuera de lo común. Viviana regresa a España.

programme.title: Cuidado con el Ángel Capítulo 39
programme.desc: Adrian le entrega a Marichuy un citatorio para que acuda como testigo a los tribunales para el juicio de custodia de Juan Miguel, mientras que este le reclama a Oneida por su demanda y por querer quitarle a la niña.

programme.title: Cuidado con el Ángel Capítulo 40
programme.desc: Marichuy lleva a Cuate con Mayita para que se recupere. El juez falla a favor de Juan Miguel y da por cerrado el caso, mientras que el licenciado del Villar se encuentra muy molesto. El padre Anselmo cuestiona a Marichuy.

programme.title: Cuidado con el Ángel Capítulo 41
programme.desc: El doctor le da una buena noticia a Marichuy, está embarazada. Eduardo encuentra a Marichuy con Amador y se lo cuenta a Juan Miguel. Estefania logra que Marichuy le de su perro para Mayita, lo cual la hace muy feliz.

programme.title: Triunfo del Amor Capítulo 61
programme.desc: María le dice a Juan Pablo que en Bernarda ha encontrado a la madre que perdió. Victoria logra ver a Linda con Osvaldo y se va decepcionada, se toma varias pastillas, Osvaldo y Fer la encuentran y termina en el hospital al borde del coma.

programme.title: Triunfo del Amor Capítulo 62

Paul shows you how to remove the entire ribcage of the chicken and also how to perfectly butcher a quail.

programme.title: A Taste of History
programme.desc: Boston is the site of so many important events that led up to the American Revolution, including the Boston Massacre, the Boston Tea Party, and the oldest existing American war ship, the USS Constitution. Visitors today can follow the Freedom Trail in downtown Boston on a walking tour through American history.

programme.title: A Taste of History
programme.desc: Everyone knows of Henry Longfellow's poem, “The Midnight Ride of Paul Revere.” The poem made an obscure silversmith into an enduring Revolutionary legend, but how much do we actually know of the events that took place at Old North Church and at the Battle of Lexington. In this episode, historian Dr. William Fowler brings the famous poem to life, and we also visit Paul Revere's house.

programme.title: A Taste of History
programme.desc: John Adams, 2nd President, is arguably one of our most important founding fathers, but he feared history would not remember him. In this episode, we visit Adams' birthplace home in Quincy, MA, and we bring Adams back to life in Independence Hall, to experience why he was so important to America's birth.

programme.title: A Taste of History
programme.desc: In the second half of the 18th Century, the island of Antigua in the West Indies played a critical role in British Naval supremacy. It was the second largest British port, after London, and was run by none other than Lord Admiral Nelson. We visit Antigua to see what life was like for British sailors, and we cook at the oldest Sugar Plantation in Antigua, Betty's Hope.

programme.title: A Taste of History
programme.desc: St. Lucia played a critical role in winning the American Revolution, when the British stationed in St. Lucia missed seeing French ships leave Martinique, headed for Yorktown, VA. We visit St. Lucia, and discover an island with a magical mixture of Indian, African, French and British cultures, and explore the rainforests where cacao, bananas and other tropical delights grow.

programme.title: A Taste of History
programme.desc: Rum was so valuable in the 18th Century, that it was often preferred over money as currency. Rum was the key ingredient in the Triangle Trade that exchanged guns, gold and slaves for this precious liquid. We travel to Guyana to see how Rum is made, and to explore the legend of El Dorado, the city of gold. Chef Staib cooks traditional Guyanan dishes using local ingredients.

programme.title: Cooking with Nick Stellino
programme.desc: Easy does it!, a delicious way to prepare a simple dish packed with flavor and panache, with easy to follow step by step instructions and plating directions. An old school recipe made simple for today's busy home chefs.

programme.title: Cooking with Nick Stellino
programme.sub-title: Pork Chops and Pineapple Upside-down Cake
programme.desc: The key to every fabulous entrée, is a fabulous sauce. Chef Stellino guides you through a the simple preparation of an elegant sauce for your everyday meal. A blast from the past ,a sweet upside-down pineapple cake that will rekindle your memory and seduce your palate.

programme.title: Cooking with Nick Stellino
programme.sub-title: Black Cod with Mango and Ginger Sauce and Sautéed Green Beans
programme.desc: Chef Stellino shares his sauce making secrets, to inspire the viewers with this elegant and sophisticated Mango and Ginger sauce that is easy to make and tastes delicious! He also shares some important fact about the uniqueness of the Black cod and his step by step secrets on how to plate this dish with the refined elegance of a professional chef.

programme.title: Cooking with Nick Stellino
programme.desc: Chef Stellino reconnects with his Italian roots as he guides the viewer through some simple and exciting techniques on how to make traditional Italian pasta dishes with the elegance and panache of an Italian born chef, with a plateful of tips, techniques and ideas to help anyone improve their style and performance in the kitchen.

programme.title: Cooking with Nick Stellino
programme.sub-title: Grilled Shrimp with Peppers and Tuna with Tomato Salad
programme.desc: A great dish does not have to be difficult to make in order to taste great! Fresh ingredients and simple techniques are at the core of these fabulously, delicious recipes. Chef Stellino guides the viewers along each step with humor and passion. He also shares his plating techniques that will help the viewers enhance the look of their finished dishes.

programme.title: Cooking with Nick Stellino
programme.desc: A soup can be a form of art! Chef Stellino shares his secrets for the perfect soups, smooth , luscious and elegant. Plus he shows the viewers a series of simple techniques to create elegant topping to dress it all up. Simple clear instructions with step by step demonstrations on how to get it done in one try!

programme.title: Pati's Mexican Table
programme.desc: Pati visits Culiacán, the capital of Sinaloa. Founded in 1531, Culiacán is the center of trade for produce, meat, and fish. Locals pride themselves on the produce cultivated from the land and nearby sea. programme.title: You Gotta Eat Here!
programme.desc: Food-obsessed funnyman John Catucci travels across Canada on a journey to find the country's best comfort foods. At each stop, Catucci dives into the kitchens of local restaurants to help cook their signature dishes. He also meets the owners, chefs and patrons who make each restaurant a destination that people want to frequent, learning about their family traditions and their passion for good food. Among the culinary adventures on Catucci's journey are sampling more than 40 gourmet burgers in London, Ontario, and braving a chef's preference mystery meal in Victoria, British Columbia.

programme.title: Repo, the Final Frontier
programme.desc: First, Froy and Sonia trace an out-of-state skip account to a seedy motel, where they come face-to-face with a hopping-mad cowboy and his female companion. Then, Matt and Sonia go where no repo man has gone before to repossess a Ford from a delusional nerd who may as well actually be from space. And finally, Lou and Lyndah have trouble getting to their car because there's a chainsaw-wielding gardener in the way.

programme.title: Coffee-slinging Waitress
programme.desc: First, Sonia and Froy storm a studio to repossess a Corvette from a surly European photographer and his hapless, bikini-clad subjects. Then, Lou and Matt stumble into a lover's quarrel - will they be able to reclaim the vehicle from two suited suitors? And finally, Lyndah and Sonia wind up getting burned on a repo, literally, when a coffee-wielding waitress goes buck-wild.

programme.title: Matt Vs. Sonia
programme.desc: First, Sonia and Froy respond to a tip from an informant and wind up in the middle of an epic story of intrigue, betrayal, and drunk girls fighting each other. Then, a high-class croquet party gets interrupted when Matt and Lou come through to repossess a Volkswagen And finally, it's a trip to a parking garage to repossess a stolen limo - with a gaggle of partiers in the back. Will Matt and Sonia be able to hook and book, or will they wind up at each others' throats?

programme.title: It's Not Funny
programme.desc: First, Matt and Froy interrupt a comedian's preparations for a show to repossess his Dodge, but not if his girlfriend has anything to say about it. Then, Lyndah & Sonia respond to a tip and sabotage a paparazzo's big shot by hooking his car. And finally, Lou and Matt have to take a van from an amateur marching band with a terrible secret.

programme.title: A Zamboni?
programme.desc: First, Matt and Froy interrupt a debtor's tattooing session to reclaim his vehicle. Then, Sonia and Lyndah find themselves in an uncomfortable situation when they barge in on a couple engaging in some risqué role-playing. And finally, Lou & Matt hit the ice and a bunch of irate hockey players in an effort to repossess a Zamboni

programme.title: Instruction and Destruction
programme.desc: First, Sonia and Froy repossess an experimental concept motorcycle from a hose-wielding yuppie. Then, Froy and Sonia head to a casting agency to repossess a car from a two-faced receptionist with a special talent for four-letter words.

programme.title: Angry Swarms
programme.desc: Matt, Lou, and Lyndah try to repo a car from a man who is not afraid to throw some punches. Then, Matt and Lou face a dilemma when they realize their target vehicle is filled with angry bees. And, Sonia and Froy hit the airwaves to reclaim a truck that's being used in a radio broadcast stunt.

programme.title: We Have to Dispose of It
programme.desc: First, Sonia and Matt hunt down a truck that's being used by a pool cleaner to engage in some illicit activities with a collection of wealthy wives. Then, Lou and Sonia find themselves in the middle of a business dispute when they try to sneak off with a catering van filled with food. And finally, Froy, Lyndah, and Matt wind up in the middle of a gang dispute when they try to repo a tricked out lowrider on the outskirts of town.

programme.title: Smart and Stupids
programme.desc: Lou and Froy repo a vehicle in a bad part of town and somebody gets punched in the face. Then, Sonia and Lyndah interrupt a tennis match to retrieve an automobile. Plus, Matt and Froy confront an out-of-control director in the middle of a shoot.

programme.title: Repo Basher vs. Matt
programme.desc: Matt, Froy, and Lou get a tip on a car whose owner has a boyfriend known for taking his fists to repossessors. Then, Lou and Matt derail an international expedition when they haul off with a tourist bus. And, Sonia and Froy bring some unwanted heat to a promotion for an energy drink by trying to repo the marketing truck.

programme.title: Tactical Planning
programme.desc: Matt and Froy walk into a moral gray area when they repossess a vehicle by stealing it. Then, Sonia and Matt discover their target van is being used in an investigation of highly toxic material. And, Matt poses as a valet to retrieve a car from an irate diner and his befuddled date.

programme.title: Four Wheel Surprise
programme.desc: First, Lou and Matt confront a big-time player and his bodyguards at a Brazilian restaurant. Then, Sonia and Lyndah head to a yard sale to get a vehicle away from the car's owner and her out-of-control friend. And finally, the whole team hits the beach in an effort to get a truck-load of ATV's away from a gang of knife-wielding beach bums.

programme.title: Breakdowns and Beatdowns
programme.desc: First, Matt and Froy head into a bad part of town to find that their target car is owned by bat-equipped gang bangers. Then, a seemingly friendly teacher and an assistant principal nearly come to blows when Froy and Sonia come around to repossess one of their vehicles Then, And finally, after the tow truck breaks down on the side of the road, Lou, Matt, and Froy are left with no options and stuck in the middle of a violent dispute between some gun-wielding neighbors.

programme.title: You Again?
programme.desc: First, Sonia and Lou get the shock a lifetime when they repossess a car from an irate doctor whom they know all too well from an earlier incident. This time he's twice as angry, and he's dead-set against giving up his car again. Then, Sonia, Matt, and Lyndah go undercover as college students to extract an extremely expensive bicycle from an extremely irate athlete. And finally, Lou and Froy head to church to repossess a van from a minister with a terrible problem.

programme.title: Scavenger Hunt
programme.desc: First, Lou and Froy transform their search for a small dirt bike into a quasi-reality show, getting a group of young smart-asses trapped into their own web. Then, Sonia and Matt head to the business district for a different sort of quarry - a high-end luxury tanning bed owned by a less-than-sympathetic German. And finally, Lou and Matt set up a high stakes sting operation to bust a shady tow-truck driver, but will their best-laid plans go up in smoke?

On the heels of the May 20, 2013 EF5 tornado, Mark & Jaclyn uncover stories behind the disaster, the recovery, and the tenacious spirit of the people of the US Midwest.

programme.title: Storm Hunters | Into the Core
programme.desc: One year after witnessing a record number of deadly twisters in Tornado Alley, Mark & Jaclyn return to the Midwest in search of more extreme storms. The hunt challenges their relationship with Mother Nature, as well as with each other.

programme.title: Extreme Weather Countdown | Steal My Thunder

programme.title: Captured

programme.title: Captured

programme.title: Secrets of the Wild
